{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = B3 Front Transparent.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Excito B3-W "Bubba" Server |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://excitostore.com/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Excito |model = B3 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -W (PC1) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = NUK-DNXA92 |icid = 4014A-AR5BHB92 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;M25P16VP; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T1G083QG-HCE6; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:22:02 |oui = 00:0B:6B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2010.06;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.39.4-11;Debian 6.0.3;
|exp_if_types = SATA, eSATA, Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pad header,, unpopulated
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, eSATA, buzzer, metal case |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, General Purpose CMOS Timer;NXP;ICM7555;;1;,,, One Wire Single LED Driver;NXP;PCA9901;;1;,,, 3A 24V Input Integrated Synchronous Buck Regulator;Fairchild;FAN2103MP;;5; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = excito |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, Arch Linux (Arm), Gentoo
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/26/2010 |estreldate = 08/2010 |estprice = 500 |upc = 7350051570445 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004FV9T2A |asin_country = UK |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Sweden
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Unex DNXA-92 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9280; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6281 ARM v5 @1.2GHz *Storage: 2MB SPI flash, SATA and eSATA *RAM: 512MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet *WLAN: [[Atheros]] 802.11abgn (2T2R) WiFi *USB: 2x USB 2.0 *Power Source: DC Jack 12V
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.excito.com/w/index.php?title=Main_Page Wiki] *[https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=excito_b3&num=1 ''Excito B3 Mini ARM Powered Server'' on '''Phoronix'''] *[https://www.expertreviews.co.uk/nas-drives/50399/excito-b3-wifi-review ''Excito B3 WiFi Review'' on '''ExpertReviews''']
